title: Angelo Brocato logo?
content:
I really need this font for this client of mine here in New Orleans. The company is 100 yrs old and we need the exact match. Anybody knows what it is?   
   
I've found some close matches but we need the exact original one. Thanks so much for the help in advance!   
   
Pompo ![scanned from their packaging](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001833im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40189.jpg)
author: pompo
